content.text:
# List of World War II aces from Germany: A–F

This is a list of fighter aces in World War II from Germany with their surname starting from A to F. A flying ace or fighter ace is a military aviator credited with shooting down five or more enemy aircraft during aerial combat. Aces are listed alphabetically by last name.
Aces
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 146-2008-0021, Egon Albrecht.jpg|Egon Albrecht, 25 claims
File:Wilhelm Batz.jpg|Wilhelm Batz, 237 claims
File:5-Luftwaffe-pilot-Major-Gerhard-Barkhorn-01.jpg|Gerhard Barkhorn, 301 claims
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 146-2008-0197, Friedrich Beckh.jpg|Friedrich Beckh
File:Heinrich Ehrler (1945).jpg|Heinrich Ehrler, 209 claims
By surname:
G–L  M–P  Q–S  T–Z
